property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may shieldify the top card of your deck. If you do, put the top card of your deck on that shield face up. (The stack is still considered one shield.) ■ Whenever a card is added to your shields, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Bau Mad Romaion, Concatenated True Wicked

property.name: Race
property.value: Dispector/Angel Command/Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {EX LIFE} (As you put this creature, shieldify the top card of your deck. When this creature would leave, put that shield into your graveyard instead.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, return up to 2 spells from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks or when this creature's "EX Life" shield leaves your shield zone, you may cast a spell that costs 8 or less from your hand for no cost.
